thi-ap9:11.1: Parammukhā nisīditvā → puratthābhimukhā santi (sya1ed, sya2ed); puratthābhimukhā ṭhitā (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap9:15.3: Mātukucchigatā santī → mātukucchigataṁ santiṁ (bj); mātu kucchigataṁ santaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed)
thi-ap9:16.3: sūtikāgehe → sūtighare pajjalanti (bj, pts-vp-pli1); sūtighareva jalanti (sya1ed, sya2ed)
thi-ap9:19.3: vasantiyā → ca jhāyanyantyā (bj); ca jhāyante (si); pajjhāyantā (sya1ed, sya2ed); ca jhāyantā (pts-vp-pli1)
